name: HOPE (itch) (Silen8Eagle)
description:
PLAY THIS GAME WITH HEADPHONES FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

In the year 2040 humanity was united and yet it was at its wild end, the environment on earth was 

becoming unstable and finding an outwardly solution was the only remaining hope. project HOPE was launched to 

find a distantly element which was the key to our problems 'eternium'.

All the assets were created from scratch and in blender software

The coding was done from scratch in VsCode and love2d framework was used to make the game.

GITHUB : https://github.com/HarshJainCodes/Hope

CONTROLS : 

press right or d to move right

press left or a to move left

press space to use the boost available

press alt + f4 to quit the game
